visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a chart with the following specifications: Chart type: areaspline, Chart title: 'Filled color zones', Axes and labels styling: Define colors, font sizes, or styles for labels, axes, and titles, Data series: Provide the data for each series, including the name of each series and its data, formatted appropriately for Highcharts, Custom colors: Specific list of colors, if desired, Additional configurations: Other settings, such as chart margins, background, legend, etc.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render an areaspline chart with a title 'Filled color zones'. The y-axis is set to have a minimum value of -10, and both the x and y axes have styled titles and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series includes a single series with the name 'Data Series' and data points ranging from -10 to 15. The series also includes zones with specific colors and fill colors to differentiate between different value ranges. The legend is enabled and styled with a specific font size and color. Additionally, the chart's plot options disable markers on the data points, and credits are disabled to clean up the chart appearance.
